mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_accountdetail (accountcode, transorderid,userorderid, tradetype, orgcode, productid, balancetype,creditamount,frozonamount, settleamount,totalcreditamount,totalfrozonamount,totalsettleamount,status,remark,createtime) values ( #{accountCode}, #{transOrderId},#{userOrderId}, #{tradeType}, #{orgCode}, #{productId}, #{balanceType},#{creditAmount},#{frozonAmount},#{settleAmount},#{totalCreditAmount},#{totalFrozonAmount},#{totalSettleAmount},#{status}, #{remark},#{createTime})
